②公開鍵
KA = gx mod n

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 164px; margin-left: 60px;

div.font:
③共有された秘密
KAB = (KB)x mod n
= gxy mod n

switch.text: ③共有された秘密KAB = (KB)x mod n...
